content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Rattled Normal damage. The target is confused for 1 round. Bludgeoning
Guarded Strike Gain +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. Piercing
Severed Tendon Until healed, the target is clumsy 1 and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its land Speed. Slashing
Power Surge Triple damage. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #18
